language.GameName: The Rise and Fall of Mecha-Perón

Menu.Help: What the f*** is this all about?

Help.Help1: After losing WWII, mad Japanese scientists built a giant automaton. It was created after Argentinean rising leader, Juan D. Perón.
Help.Help2: Sadly, the AI implanted in the Mecha went rogue and started to wreck havoc on the Japanese capital city.
Help.Help3: You command the path of destruction of Mecha-Perón. Have fun.
